title: Constitution and cyber
content: If i memorize all the MCQ from cyber topic can I get 25/30

comments.body: Bro as a higher sem student I feel like crying when I see you guys asking about constitution. You  can even score 25 without studying. Just remember those articles and go and the rest is common sense.
Uhhh you can get even 30/30 depending on how good your memory power is cause all questions came from mcqs only for us
U don't have to memorize , if u go throught the mcqs 1-2 times , u will automatically remember the answers as u see the questions in the exam
